name: Telegram Video Watermark Adder Bot
description: A Telegram bot that adds watermarks to videos using Pyrogram.

API_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or use @TeleORG_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or use @TeleORG_Bot

OWNER_ID.description: Numeric Telegram user ID of the bot owner

DATABASE_URL.description: MongoDB connection URI for storing user data and broadcast info

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Optional. Telegram channel ID for force subscription (-100123456789)

PRESET.description: FFmpeg encoding preset (ultrafast, superfast, veryfast, etc.)
